summary:
────────────────────────────────
**Summary**
• Augment, founded by Deliverr’s boss, just snagged $85M in Series A funding.
• Redpoint led the charge, with the round coming hot on the heels of a $25M seed round.
• This cash injection is all about turbocharging Augment’s AI-driven logistics play.
Impact — Augment’s massive funding haul signals the market’s hunger for tech that slashes supply chain bullshit.

────────────────────────────────
Link: https://techcrunch.com/2025/09/04/ai-logistics-startup-augment-from-deliverrs-founder-raises-massive-85m-series-a/
